languages.text: "Сироты на корабле уже обеспечены необходимым минимумом, но я все чаще думаю добавить им паек и выписать больше комплектов одежды. Это не заменит им семью, но сделает жизнь немного лучше, тем более средств на корабле достаточно для этой, в сущности, незначительной статьи расходов". {n}Несмотря на низкое качество звука, этот голос вы опознаете как мужской.{/n}

"The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сироты на корабле уже обеспечены необходимым минимумом, но я все чаще думаю добавить им паек и выписать больше комплектов одежды. Это не заменит им семью, но сделает жизнь немного лучше, тем более средств на корабле достаточно для этой, в сущности, незначительной статьи расходов". {n}Несмотря на низкое качество звука, этот голос вы опознаете как мужской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare minimum, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost but it will somewhat improve their lives, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that essentially trivial expense." {n}Despite the low sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

languages.text: « Les orphelins du vaisseau sont déjà pourvus du minimum vital, mais il m'arrive parfois de vouloir augmenter leurs rations et leur commander davantage de vêtements. Rien ne remplacera les familles qu'ils ont perdues, mais cela rendrait leur vie un peu plus agréable, et ces dépenses insignifiantes entameraient à peine les immenses ressources du vaisseau. » {n}Malgré la piètre qualité du son, vous déterminez que la voix est celle d'un homme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les orphelins du vaisseau sont déjà pourvus du minimum vital, mais il m'arrive parfois de vouloir augmenter leurs rations et leur commander davantage de vêtements. Rien ne remplacera les familles qu'ils ont perdues, mais cela rendrait leur vie un peu plus agréable, et ces dépenses insignifiantes entameraient à peine les immenses ressources du vaisseau. » {n}Malgré la piètre qualité du son, vous déterminez que la voix est celle d'un homme.{/n}

languages.text: «A los huérfanos de la nave ya se les ha provisto de lo más esencial, pero de vez en cuando me planteo aumentar sus raciones y ordenar que les confeccionen ropas nuevas. Eso no sustituirá a las familias que han perdido, pero imagino que mejoraría su calidad de vida, y la nave dispone de suficientes recursos para cubrir un gasto relativamente trivial». {n}A pesar de la escasa calidad de la grabación, logras discernir que la voz es masculina.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A los huérfanos de la nave ya se les ha provisto de lo más esencial, pero de vez en cuando me planteo aumentar sus raciones y ordenar que les confeccionen ropas nuevas. Eso no sustituirá a las familias que han perdido, pero imagino que mejoraría su calidad de vida, y la nave dispone de suficientes recursos para cubrir un gasto relativamente trivial». {n}A pesar de la escasa calidad de la grabación, logras discernir que la voz es masculina.{/n}

languages.text: “这艘船上的孤儿已经得到了最基本的生活必需品，但我总是想增加他们的口粮，为他们订购更多衣服。虽然这么做没办法弥补他们失去家人的痛苦，但肯定会在一定程度上改善他们的生活。更何况，这艘船上的资源非常充足，完全足以支付这笔微不足道的费用。”{n}尽管音质很差，但你能听出来是个男人的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这艘船上的孤儿已经得到了最基本的生活必需品，但我总是想增加他们的口粮，为他们订购更多衣服。虽然这么做没办法弥补他们失去家人的痛苦，但肯定会在一定程度上改善他们的生活。更何况，这艘船上的资源非常充足，完全足以支付这笔微不足道的费用。”{n}尽管音质很差，但你能听出来是个男人的声音。{/n}

languages.text: 「船の孤児たちは、最低限のものは貰っている。しかし時々、彼らの配給量を増やし、衣服一式を注文することを考えている。それは子供たちが失った家族の代わりにはならないだろうが、彼らの生活を少し改善するだろう」 {n}音の質は悪いが、声から男性だと判断できた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「船の孤児たちは、最低限のものは貰っている。しかし時々、彼らの配給量を増やし、衣服一式を注文することを考えている。それは子供たちが失った家族の代わりにはならないだろうが、彼らの生活を少し改善するだろう」 {n}音の質は悪いが、声から男性だと判断できた。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Waisen auf dem Schiff bekommen bereits alles Nötige, und doch überlege ich hin und wieder, ihre Rationen zu erhöhen und mehr Kleidung für sie zu bestellen. Das ersetzt ihre toten Familien nicht, doch es würde ihr Leben etwas besser machen. Zumal das Schiff genügend Ressourcen hat, um diese vergleichsweise triviale Ausgabe mühelos zu verschmerzen." {n}Trotz der schlechten Tonqualität erkennst du, dass ein Mann spricht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}

languages.text: "Gemideki yetimlere zaten temel ihtiyaçları temin ediliyor ancak arada bir onların kumanyalarını artırmayı ve onlar için daha fazla kıyafet sipariş etmeyi düşünüyorum. Kaybettikleri ailelerinin yerini tutmaz ama hayatlarını biraz olsun iyileştirebilir. Özellikle de geminin buna kıyasla gereksiz olan birçok harcamayı karşılayabilecek kadar kaynağı olduğu düşünüldüğünde." {n}Ses kalitesi kötü olmasına rağmen konuşan kişinin erkek olduğuna kanaat getirdin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The orphans on the ship have already been provided with the bare essentials, but every so often I consider increasing their rations and ordering more sets of clothes for them. That will not replace the families they lost, but it will improve their lives somewhat, especially given that the ship has enough resources to cover that comparably trivial expense." {n}Despite the poor sound quality, you determine the voice to be male.{/n}
